at.irian.ankor.application

Class SimpleSingleRootApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.irian.ankor.application.BaseApplication
      • at.irian.ankor.application.SimpleSingleRootApplication
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Application
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CollaborationSingleRootApplication, RatesServerApplication, StatelessTodoServerApplication

    public abstract class SimpleSingleRootApplication
extends BaseApplication
    Convenient Application implementation that supports an arbitrary number of model instances that all have the same model root name (typically called "root").

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      protected SimpleSingleRootApplication(String applicationName, String modelName)

    • Method Detail

      • getKnownModelNames

        public Set<String> getKnownModelNames()
        Returns:
        a set with the model name as single element

      • lookupModel

        public final Object lookupModel(String modelName,
                 Map<String,Object> connectCriteria)
        Checks the given model name and then delegates to lookupModel(java.util.Map).
        Parameters:
        modelName - name of model
        connectCriteria - lookup criteria
        Returns:
        existing Model instance or null if there is no matching model yet
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the given model name does not match this applications model name

      • createModel

        public final Object createModel(String modelName,
                 Map<String,Object> connectParameters,
                 RefContext refContext)
        Checks the given model name, then delegates to createModel(at.irian.ankor.ref.Ref, java.util.Map) and finally stores the given model instance in an internal map for later retrieval.
        Parameters:
        modelName - name of model (must match this applications model name)
        connectParameters - (optional) connect parameters
        refContext - RefContext for the corresponding ModelSession
        Returns:
        newly created model root object
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the given model name does not match this applications model name

      • releaseModel

        public final void releaseModel(String modelName,
                Object modelRoot)
        Checks the given model name, then delegates to releaseModel(Object) and finally disposes the given model instance from memory.
        Parameters:
        modelName - name of model
        modelRoot - root of model instance to free
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the given model name does not match this applications model name

      • lookupModel

        public Object lookupModel(Map<String,Object> connectCriteria)
        Always returns null. Derived classes may overwrite this method to support collaboration or concurrent device usage.
        Returns:
        always null

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Description copied from interface: Application
        Free all resources associated by this Ankor application.

      • createModel

        public abstract Object createModel(Ref rootRef,
                 Map<String,Object> connectParameters)

      • releaseModel

        public void releaseModel(Object model)
        Does nothing. Derived classes may overwrite this method to implement additional cleanup prior to disposing the given model instance from memory.
